label: ABC3_hR10_148_c_c_f-001
title: FePSe$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
We use the data taken by (Wiedenmann, 1981) at 15K, while the ICSD entry used their data at 154K. 
 (Klingen, 1973) placed this structure in the non-centrosymmetric \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_hR10_146_2a_2a_2b-001}{space group $R3$ \#146}. 
 For quaternary compounds in this structure, see \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B6CD_hR10_146_2a_2b_a_a-001}{Li$_{2}$ZrTeO$_{6}$}. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
